abstract: The sophisticated Conficker worm, which has infected millions of computers worldwide, will activate on April 1. But what will it actually do?
snippet: The sophisticated Conficker worm, which has infected millions of computers worldwide, will activate on April 1. But what will it actually do?
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:57 p.m.  Added links to malware removal tools.

headline.main: The Conficker Worm: April Fool’s Joke or Unthinkable Disaster?
